response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am offering this unique item to you at a special price of $950,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its market value of $1,200,000, allowing you to benefit from an attractive discount while securing a remarkable asset. I believe this offer presents an excellent chance for both of us to achieve our financial goals. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
